title: Linear Regression with CPP
description: uncover working of linear regression by implementing the algorithm in a low-level language like c++. Learn the algorithm, its working principle, derivatives involved in implementation and visualising result with imgui and implot.

title: Templates | Nix Flake
description: Templates is wonderful feature of nix-flakes, that make spining up new project easy. In this blog I am going brief about how I use them in my workflow, and teach you how to use it.

title: How I Created My Nvim Plugin | feat. Cowpile
description: I will brief about how i created a neovim plugin to ease my development experience, COWPILE - allows you to run various compile commands within your neovim window. It is a simple application that reads from a .sln.lua file and runs most used commands.
